name: The Odd Tales of Grunva & Sire
name_original: The Odd Tales of Grunva & Sire
description:
After her first experience with inter-dimensional travel, Grunva finds herself on a strange little moon. Is she on a quest to discover a hidden treasure, running away from home, or just on vacation? We don’t know yet, but what we know is that she can’t proceed on her own. I wonder who could help her get away from this moon…

  • Discover a new dimension full of weird little critters.
  • Talk to them, but beware! They don’t make a lot of sense.
  • Choose your interactions carefully, so they give you things and information.
  • Solve character-specific puzzles to obtains items.
  • Enjoy a 2D cartoonish art and animation style.
  • Listen to an original soundtrack with 3D sound.
  • Complete your quest to discover the mystery of the moon.
  • Uncover the beginnings of a story where friendship and kindness are the keys to recovering what you’ve lost.
